alert.note: Alert for Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 25 at 11:58AM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley and Central Sacramento Valley Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until noon PST today. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
